entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
